scripts.build-client: cd client && export REACT_APP_BUILD_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) && export REACT_APP_BUILD_ID=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && export REACT_APP_COMMIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') && export GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false && npm run build && cd .. && ./scripts/prerender-canonicals.sh && node scripts/verify-build-metadata.js
scripts.build-client-dev: cd client && export REACT_APP_BUILD_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) && export REACT_APP_BUILD_ID=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && export REACT_APP_COMMIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') && export GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true && npm run build && cd .. && ./scripts/prerender-canonicals.sh && node scripts/verify-build-metadata.js
scripts.deploy-build: echo 'ðŸšš Deploying build to root directory...' && cp -r client/build/* . && echo 'âœ… Build deployed to root directory'
scripts.build: npm run install-client && npm run build-client && npm run deploy-build
